title: Introduction to yarraWQ
text: yarraWQ package provides cleaned water quality data collected Yarra River monitoring program Victoria, Australia. also includes helper functions interactive Shiny app explore changes key water quality parameters pH, temperature, turbidity, dissolved oxygen time.

title: Introduction to yarraWQ
Introduction to yarraWQ
text: dataset yarra_wq contains 876 rows 16 variables, including: site_id: Monitoring site ID name: Site name date, year, month: Observation date parameter: Parameter measured (e.g., pH, temperature) value: Recorded measurement unit_of_measurement: Measurement unit (e.g., mg/L, NTU, °C)
code: head(yarra_wq) #>   site_id                 name            datetime data_type parameter_id #> 1  229143 YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY 1991-01-08 13:50:00   Quality          210 #> 2  229143 YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY 1991-02-12 09:35:00   Quality          210 #> 3  229143 YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY 1991-03-12 14:00:00   Quality          210 #> 4  229143 YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY 1991-04-09 11:00:00   Quality          210 #> 5  229143 YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY 1991-05-07 11:10:00   Quality          210 #> 6  229143 YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY 1991-06-11 10:25:00   Quality          210 #>   parameter value unit_of_measurement quality resolution                date #> 1        pH   7.1                  pH      65   Raw Data 1991-01-08 13:50:00 #> 2        pH   7.0                  pH      65   Raw Data 1991-02-12 09:35:00 #> 3        pH   6.2                  pH      65   Raw Data 1991-03-12 14:00:00 #> 4        pH   6.7                  pH      65   Raw Data 1991-04-09 11:00:00 #> 5        pH   7.7                  pH      65   Raw Data 1991-05-07 11:10:00 #> 6        pH   6.9                  pH      65   Raw Data 1991-06-11 10:25:00 #>   year month weekday hour period #> 1 1991   Jan     Tue   13  1990s #> 2 1991   Feb     Tue    9  1990s #> 3 1991   Mar     Tue   14  1990s #> 4 1991   Apr     Tue   11  1990s #> 5 1991   May     Tue   11  1990s #> 6 1991   Jun     Tue   10  1990s

title: Introduction to yarraWQ
text: function plot_yarra_metric() creates simple time series plot one chosen parameter (e.g., “pH”).  can also filter specific monitoring sites:
code: plot_yarra_metric(parameter_name = "pH") unique(yarra_wq$name)[1:3] #> [1] "YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY" NA                     NA

title: Introduction to yarraWQ
text: flexible exploration, can launch interactive app included package. app run building vignette. Shiny app allows users : Select parameter site View corresponding trends interactively Compare results across multiple sites

title: Introduction to yarraWQ
text: yarraWQ demonstrates turn reproducible analysis pipeline R package includes reusable functions interactive interface exploration.

text: Ruowei Li. Author, maintainer.

code: @Manual{,   title = {yarraWQ: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer},   author = {Ruowei Li},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: yarraWQ R package designed make Yarra River Water Quality dataset easy use explore. provides clean, ready--analyze data, helper functions visualization, interactive Shiny app exploring trends water parameters time across sites. Note: dataset used package (yarra_wq) ETC5521 unit. Although differs datasets used Assignments 1–3, allows comprehensive interactive analysis, meeting requirements assessment.

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: can install development version yarraWQ GitHub :

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: ’s explore included dataset: Generate simple time-series plot selected water quality parameter (example, pH): function allows quickly visualize long-term water quality changes Yarra River.
code: library(yarraWQ) head(yarra_wq)  # filter just pH measurements filtered <- filter_yarra_data(yarra_wq, parameter_name = "pH") head(filtered) plot_yarra_metric(parameter_name = "pH")

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: interactive exploration, can launch Shiny app: app allows users : Select parameter site View corresponding time trends Compare results across multiple monitoring stations

title: Yarra River Water Quality Explorer
text: dataset (yarra_wq) adapted course-provided data file yarra_wq_clean.csv, representing long-term monitoring records Yarra River’s water quality. Variables include pH, temperature, turbidity, dissolved oxygen, .

what: Filter Yarra River water quality data — filter_yarra_data
title: Filter Yarra River water quality data — filter_yarra_data
text: helper function returns filtered version yarra_wq dataset (included yarraWQ package). lets select water quality parameter look (example "pH", "temperature", "turbidity"), optionally limit single monitoring site.

title: Filter Yarra River water quality data — filter_yarra_data
Filter Yarra River water quality data — filter_yarra_data
text: data data frame columns yarra_wq. Typically just pass yarra_wq. parameter_name string giving parameter filter , example "pH", "temperature", "turbidity", "dissolved_oxygen". matched parameter column. site_name Optional. string giving site filter (matching name column, e.g. "YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY"). NULL (default), sites included.

title: Filter Yarra River water quality data — filter_yarra_data
text: tibble/data.frame containing rows match requested parameter (provided) site. nothing matches, returned tibble 0 rows.

title: Filter Yarra River water quality data — filter_yarra_data
text: useful plotting function (plot_yarra_metric()) Shiny app type filtering. Putting logic one place avoids repeating code multiple places.

title: Filter Yarra River water quality data — filter_yarra_data
code: # Keep only pH measurements (all sites): # filtered <- filter_yarra_data(yarra_wq, parameter_name = "pH")  # Keep only pH at one specific site: # filtered_site <- filter_yarra_data( #   yarra_wq, #   parameter_name = "pH", #   site_name = "YARRA @ CHANDLER HWY" # )

what: Plot a water quality parameter over time — plot_yarra_metric
title: Plot a water quality parameter over time — plot_yarra_metric
text: Draw time series chosen water quality parameter (e.g. "pH", "Turbidity", etc.) yarra_wq dataset. data long format: row one observation one parameter one time.

title: Plot a water quality parameter over time — plot_yarra_metric
Plot a water quality parameter over time — plot_yarra_metric
text: parameter_name Character. parameter plot, e.g. "pH". site_name Optional character. provided, filter site (matches name column yarra_wq). NULL, use sites.

title: Plot a water quality parameter over time — plot_yarra_metric
text: ggplot object (time series measured values).

title: Plot a water quality parameter over time — plot_yarra_metric
code: # After loading the package: # plot_yarra_metric(parameter_name = "pH") # plot_yarra_metric(parameter_name = "pH", #                    site_name = "YARRA @ WARRANDYTE (ROAD BRIDGE)")

what: Launch the Yarra River Water Quality Shiny App — run_yarra_app
title: Launch the Yarra River Water Quality Shiny App — run_yarra_app
text: function opens interactive dashboard exploring Yarra River water quality dataset (yarra_wq).

title: Launch the Yarra River Water Quality Shiny App — run_yarra_app
Launch the Yarra River Water Quality Shiny App — run_yarra_app
text: Launches Shiny app; return value.

title: Launch the Yarra River Water Quality Shiny App — run_yarra_app
text: app allows : Choose parameter (e.g., pH, Temperature, ) Choose site view combined Explore values change time

title: Launch the Yarra River Water Quality Shiny App — run_yarra_app

what: Yarra River Water Quality Dataset — yarra_wq
title: Yarra River Water Quality Dataset — yarra_wq
text: cleaned dataset containing water quality measurements Yarra River monitoring program.

title: Yarra River Water Quality Dataset — yarra_wq
Yarra River Water Quality Dataset — yarra_wq
text: data frame 876 rows 16 variables: site Monitoring location name date Date observation ph pH level water temperature Water temperature (°C) turbidity Turbidity (NTU) dissolved_oxygen Dissolved oxygen concentration (mg/L) nitrate Nitrate concentration (mg/L) ... available environmental indicators

title: Yarra River Water Quality Dataset — yarra_wq
text: Adapted course dataset “yarra_wq_clean.csv”.
